column5:
Thank you. Yes it does. :)
Hope you are in a better place.
thank you for this practical advice!

i hope that people contribute to this to help answer the question. For a 13 year old, please make sure that you are safe first. Its super tricky even as a parent, and I can only imagine what you are going through. If you feel its unsafe for you, best that you self-care. And then you can help others.
